entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:28 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:28 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 30 gusting to 60 overnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:28 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
